alert.note: Alert for Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 26 at 2:27PM EDT until March 27 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches, resulting in storm total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. The highest accumulations will be on western facing slopes in central and western Garrett County. Winds will gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Garrett County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates in excess of 1 inch per hour have been observed across southern and central Garrett County. Similar snowfall rates and reduced visibilities are expected through the evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
